page.title: 08The Todmorden Show
page.content: Each year in Todmorden we have an agricultural show in the park. People come to the show from all over the north of England to see well known show jumpers, quaulifying for Wembley. This year there were dog shows, sheep shearing and bull showing.The big tents had goats, rabbits and hens and there was a handicraft tent in which people entered sewing, painting and cakes for prizes.In the rabbit tent, one was in a glass bowl, because the owner didn't want anyone to touch it, as it was so white and fluffy. There was also a fair, a beer tent, a buffet tent and a St.John Ambulance tent, along with ice cream vans, fish & chip vans, sweet stalls and alot of noise.This year there was a fight with some drunken people,from out of town, but the police stopped it.
